nodes.text: Heethra Fansoff was an individual who served as the commissioner of the Canto Bight Police Department by the C.R.C. year 8010. As commissioner of the CBPD, Fansoff led communication efforts with the New Republic, exchanging summaries of police work, unsolved cases, and lists of suspects and allies.
Heethra Fansoff was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in 2018.
